metadata.title: CVE-2014-4337 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The process_browse_data function in utils/cups-browsed.c in cups-browsed incups-filters before 1.0.53 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (out-of-bounds read and application crash) via crafted packet data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-4337` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cups-browsed - 1.0.52-0ubuntu1.1
cups-filters - 1.0.52-0ubuntu1.1
cups-filters-core-drivers - 1.0.52-0ubuntu1.1
libcupsfilters1 - 1.0.52-0ubuntu1.1
libfontembed1 - 1.0.52-0ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cups-filters package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.52-0ubuntu1.1').
